Header: Minister Sajith Premadasa declares open Poson Kalapaya (Watch video)
Content: The ‘Poson Kalapaya’ of the Sithul Pawwa Raja Maha Viharaya was declared opened on Tuesday, June 2, by the Minister of Housing and Samurdhi, Sajith Premadasa. Minister Sajith Premadasa and his mother Hema Premadasa called upon the Chief Incumbent of the Sithul Pawwa Viharaya. They then observed an offering of milk rice. Later, the Poson Kalapaya got underway with the unveiling of the sacred relics of the Lord Buddha.
